name: Black River Crossing: Ferry of Shadows
description: Dark river; rope-tethered ferry. Four notch pairs on oar. Seven pale fish circle like stars. Maliya candle flame bends inland. Naia traces fish constellation. Riddle: Even water counts, if you ask it softly.
prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card, muted sepia + indigo + teal + faint gold highlights. Ritual haunting atmosphere, layered symbolic composition. Dark river; rope-tethered ferry. Four notch pairs on oar. Seven pale fish circle like stars. Maliya candle flame bends inland. Naia traces fish constellation.. Key props numeric: 4 notchPairs, 7 fish, 1 bentFlame. Cipher letter: M Bearing: 160°. Intricate line engraving, subtle volumetric mist, painterly etched hybrid
